text: weâ€™re looking at a long-overdue update of the Local HubL Server. Anything you folks really want to see in there?
i would love to see it work similarly to how the app Local by Flywheel works: <https://local.getflywheel.com/>
Anything in particular you like about that?
ease of use.  push deployments in a single click
and pull the latest live site in a single click

- drag&drop templates support (json like CMs by FTP would be great)
- Custom modules v2
- Kind of tool to auto publish drag&drop, coded files and CMs from local environments

and maybe a json generator as huge templates and CMs wilth a lot of widgets or fields will be crazy to write in local :smile:
good feedback. CMv2 modules for sure will be in there
Very excited to see what is to come.

Topic: Blog templates

Question: Does any one know what happens to the order of tags assigned to a blog post? It appears that it sorts them alphabetically. When going back in to edit the post they retain the order they where entered in. But when pulled in to the blog they are arranged alphabetically

Goal: To have order tags assigned, be the same order they appear on the listing or post detail page.
